conversion_verification.notes: True 3D massing is present with an angled/isometric view, visible wall height/thickness, and readable interior volumes; ceiling/roof is effectively treated as a cutaway (shown as a lifted slab) allowing interior visibility.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have consistent height and thickness with visible top/side faces; interior volume reads clearly. Cutaway is functional but not cleanly removed (roof slab floats above), and some wall junctions/edges appear simplified.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall outer footprint and a multi-room 3BHK-like partitioning are present, but several key plan features are hard to confirm: living/dining center and kitchen/utility/balconies are not clearly differentiated; internal partition positions and proportions appear approximated rather than plan-accurate.

interior_elements.notes: Beds are present in multiple rooms, suggesting bedrooms are mapped. Kitchen and bathroom fixtures are largely absent or too minimal to verify correct placement; living/dining furniture is minimal/unclear.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with readable wall/floor separation and no UI/text clutter. Monochrome materials and limited openings reduce the ability to verify doors/windows and some room identities.

detected_errors.description: Room proportions and several partition locations appear generalized; key spaces (living/dining, kitchen/utility, balconies) are not distinctly or confidently matched to the 2D plan.
Doors/windows/openings are not clearly modeled or are insufficiently visible to verify correct wall placement and sizing against the 2D plan.
Furniture is incomplete for verification: kitchen elements and bathroom fixtures are largely missing; living/dining furniture is minimal, weakening room-identity confirmation.
Very uniform materials and simplified geometry reduce geometric legibility for detailed plan-to-model comparison.

summary: A genuine 3D cutaway conversion is achieved, but the layout appears approximated and lacks sufficient openings and fixtures to verify faithful room-by-room geometric accuracy.
